title: What are the limitations of CMOS technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: These come for me to mind: Scaling transistors towards smaller sizes coming to an endRequired ESD and latchup protection.The smaller an MOSFET is, the bigger the leakage currentMaking analog circuits with CMOS is harder AFAIK

We can’t reduce the number of transistor in CMOS That’s why we are using nowadays hybrid technology Like Transmission gate Pass transistor logic For any help to learn circuit design Call me At 9599745251 or text me
